ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards and Pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh...dumb me...didn t think of that.  :/ It didn t dawn on me until you said that that I have more than enough plat to finance a CR bag of flutes and
ygData.messageBody:
Heh...dumb me...didn't think of that. :/

It didn't dawn on me until you said that that I have more than enough plat
to finance a CR bag of flutes and drums...hehe.

I know what I'm doing next time I'm on...hehe.

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 10:11 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards and Pulling


You should have a backpack full of flutes and drums in the bank, silly billy
:-)

----- Original Message -----
From: "Christopher Sanders" <christopher.sanders@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 4:38 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards and Pulling

stress

to
